Text: FW Job Descriptionstom attached please find the confidential job descriptions that we have been retained to work on for exelon power team please advise on how you would like to proceed i have additional information from their vp if you would like to discuss further best regards todd j goehring

RE Job Descriptionshow about the fuels gas position Original Message From Donohoe Tom mailtoTom NRONcom Sent Friday November PM To Subject RE Job Descriptions I am not sure these are right for my experience I have not ever traded power Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday November PM To Donohoe Tom Subject FW Job Descriptions tom attached please find the confidential job descriptions that we have been retained to work on for exelon power team please advise on how you would like to proceed i have additional information from their vp if you would like to discuss further best regards todd j goehring This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE i will compile a list and pass it along via email regards todd j goehring Original Message From Donohoe Tom mailtoTom NRONcom Sent Wednesday November PM To Subject Todd I would like to know which companies you have represented me to and the result Please let me know as soon as possible I also would like your phone number Tom Donohoe This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE todd j goehrings informationyour information can i give you a call this afternoon maybe pm est best regards todd j goehring Original Message From Scholtes Diana mailtoDiana NRONcom Sent Friday November PM To Subject RE todd j goehrings information Todd I appreciate your call earlier this morning I apologize for not being able to speak to you at the time I have attached my resume and look forward to speaking with you Regards Diana Scholtes Original Message From mailto Sent Friday November AM To Scholtes Diana Subject todd j goehrings information diana i look forward to speaking with you late today or monday Best Regards Todd J Goehring Vice President MRI Energy Broad Street Suite Shrewsbury NJ tel x fax This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
